docs.lead_paragraph: A bipartisan compromise is reached in one chamber, while hopes are dashed for agreement in the other chamber.

headline.main: Jobs and Health Bills Make for Busy Day at Capitol
headline.print_headline: Jobs and Health Bills Make for Busy Day at Capitol

docs.abstract: Senate votes to move forward with long-stalled proposal to extend aid to more than two million people whose unemployment assistance ran out in late 2013; measure appears likely to falter in House; leaders from both parties agree to muscle through bill that would prevent cut in Medicare payments to doctors; coalition of Democratic senators call for significant changes to Affordable Care Act.
docs.snippet: A bipartisan compromise is reached in one chamber, while hopes are dashed for agreement in the other chamber.
